option.name: -help
option.description: print usage information

option.name: -version
option.description: print the version information

option.name: -dump_options
option.description: print information about each option

option.name: -dump_options_paramfile
option.description: print information about each option to paramfile

option.name: -dump_options_xmlfile
option.description: print information about each option to XML file

option.name: par
option.description: input parameter file

option.name: pversion
option.description: processing version string

option.name: suite
option.description: product suite string for loading suite-specific defaults

option.name: eval
option.description: evaluation bitmask 0: standard processing 1: init to old aerosol models 16: enables MODIS cirrus mask 32: use test sensor info file 64: use test rayleigh tables 128: use test aerosol tables 256: use test polarization tables 1024: mask modis mirror-side 1 (navfail) 2048: mask modis mirror-side 2 (navfail) 4096: remove warm tests for SSTref 8192: use alt sensor infor file in eval 32768: enables spherical path geom for dtran

validValue.description: use alt sensor infor file in eval
enables spherical path geom for dtran

option.name: ifile
option.description: input L1 file name

option.name: ilist
option.description: file containing list of input files, one per line

option.name: geofile
option.description: input L1 geolocation file name (MODIS only)

option.name: ofile
option.description: output L2 file #1 name, output vicarious L1B for inverse mode ofile[#] = additional output L2 file name

option.name: il2file
option.description: input L2 file names for sensor to be used as a calibrator. Alternatively, a data point can be used as a calibrator (e.g. MOBY) il2file[#] = additional L2 callibration file names

option.name: tgtfile
option.description: vicarious calibration target file

option.name: aerfile
option.description: aerosol model specification file

option.name: metafile
option.description: output meta-data file

option.name: l2prod
option.value: aot_869 angstrom Rrs_vvv chlor_a Kd_490 pic poc cdom_index ipar nflh
option.description: L2 products to be included in ofile #1 l2prod[#] = L2 products to be included in ofile[#]

option.name: spixl
option.description: start pixel number

option.name: epixl
option.description: end pixel number (-1=the last pixel)

option.name: dpixl
option.description: pixel subsampling interval

option.name: sline
option.description: start line number

option.name: eline
option.description: end line number (-1=the last line)

option.name: dline
option.description: line subsampling interval

option.name: ctl_pt_incr
option.description: control-point pixel increment for lon/lat arrays

option.name: proc_ocean
option.description: toggle ocean processing 1: On 0: Off 2: force all pixels to be processed as ocean

validValue.description: force all pixels to be processed as ocean

option.name: proc_land
option.description: toggle land processing

option.name: proc_sst
option.description: toggle SST processing (default=1 for MODIS, 0 otherwise)

option.name: atmocor
option.description: toggle atmospheric correction

option.name: mode
option.description: processing mode 0: forward processing 1: inverse (calibration) mode, targeting to nLw=0 2: inverse (calibration) mode, given nLw target 3: inverse (calibration) mode, given Lw target (internally normalized)

validValue.description: inverse (calibration) mode, given Lw target (internally normalized)

option.name: aer_opt
option.description: aerosol mode option -99: No aerosol subtraction > 0: Multi-scattering with fixed model (provide model number, 1-N, relative to aermodels list) 0: White aerosol extrapolation. -1: Multi-scattering with 2-band model selection -2: Multi-scattering with 2-band, RH-based model selection and iterative NIR correction -3: Multi-scattering with 2-band model selection and iterative NIR correction -4: Multi-scattering with fixed model pair (requires aermodmin, aermodmax, aermodrat specification) -5: Multi-scattering with fixed model pair and iterative NIR correction (requires aermodmin, aermodmax, aermodrat specification) -6: Multi-scattering with fixed angstrom (requires aer_angstrom specification) -7: Multi-scattering with fixed angstrom and iterative NIR correction (requires aer_angstrom specification) -8: Multi-scattering with fixed aerosol optical thickness (requires taua specification) -9: Multi-scattering with 2-band model selection using Wang et al. 2009 to switch between SWIR and NIR. (MODIS only, requires aer_swir_short, aer_swir_long, aer_wave_short, aer_wave_long) -10: Multi-scattering with MUMM correction and MUMM NIR calculation -11: Spectral optimization via Kuchinke (SeaWiFS-only) -12: Spectral matching via Gordon (SeaWiFS-only)

validValue.description: Multi-scattering with 2-band, RH-based model selection and
Multi-scattering with fixed aerosol optical thickness
Multi-scattering with 2-band model selection using Wang et al. 2009

option.name: aer_wave_short
option.description: shortest sensor wavelength for aerosol model selection

option.name: aer_wave_long
option.description: longest sensor wavelength for aerosol model selection

option.name: aer_swir_short
option.description: shortest sensor wavelength for SWIR-based NIR Lw correction

option.name: aer_swir_long
option.description: longest sensor wavelength for SWIR-based NIR Lw correction

option.name: aer_rrs_short
option.description: Rrs at shortest sensor wavelength for aerosol model selection

option.name: aer_rrs_long
option.description: Rrs at longest sensor wavelength for aerosol model selection

option.name: aermodmin
option.description: lower-bounding model to use for fixed model pair aerosol option

option.name: aermodmax
option.description: upper-bounding model to use for fixed model pair aerosol option

option.name: aermodrat
option.description: ratio to use for fixed model pair aerosol option

option.name: aer_angstrom
option.description: aerosol angstrom exponent for model selection

option.name: aer_iter_max
option.description: maximum number of iterations for NIR water-leaving radiance estimation.

option.name: mumm_alpha
option.description: water-leaving reflectance ratio for MUMM turbid water atmospheric correction

option.name: mumm_gamma
option.description: two-way Rayleigh-aerosol transmittance ratio for MUMM turbid water atmospheric correction

option.name: mumm_epsilon
option.description: aerosol reflectance ratio for MUMM turbid water atmospheric correction

option.name: degc
option.description: Deg C for AVHRR

option.name: absaer_opt
option.description: absorbing aerosol flagging option 0: use rhow constant 1: apply chlorophyll climatology to calculate rhow 2: 1+validate against nLw_412 climatology

validValue.description: apply chlorophyll climatology to calculate rhow

option.name: glint_opt
option.description: glint correction: 0: glint correction off 1: standard glint correction 2: simple glint correction

option.name: outband_opt
option.description: out-of-band correction for water-leaving radiances 2: On (default for MODIS, SeaWiFS, OCTS) 0: Off (default for MOS, OSMI)

option.name: oxaband_opt
option.description: oxygen a-band correction option (default On for SeaWiFS, OSMI, and OCTS, Off otherwise)

option.name: filter_opt
option.description: filtering input data option (default On for OCTS, Off otherwise)

option.name: filter_file
option.description: data file for input filtering

option.name: brdf_opt
option.description: Bidirectional reflectance correction 0: no correction 1: Fresnel reflection/refraction correction for sensor path 3: Fresnel reflection/refraction correction for sensor + solar path 7: Morel f/Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor 15: Gordon DT + Morel f/Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor 19: Morel Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor

validValue.description: Fresnel reflection/refraction correction for sensor path
Fresnel reflection/refraction correction for sensor + solar path
Morel f/Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor
Gordon DT + Morel f/Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor
Morel Q + Fresnel solar + Fresnel sensor

option.name: gas_opt
option.description: gaseous transmittance bitmask selector 0: no correction 1: Ozone 2: CO2 4: NO2 8: H2O

option.name: iop_opt
option.description: IOP model for use in downstream products 0: None (products requiring a or bb will fail) 1: Carder 2: GSM 3: QAA 4: PML 5: NIWA 6: LAS 7: GIOP

validValue.description: None (products requiring a or bb will fail)

option.name: polfile
option.description: polarization sensitivites filename leader

option.name: pol_opt
option.description: polarization correction (sensor-specific) 0: no correction 1: only Rayleigh component is polarized 2: all radiance polarized like Rayleigh 3: only Rayleigh and Glint are polarized (MODIS default) 4: all radiance polarized like Rayleigh + Glint

validValue.description: only Rayleigh and Glint are polarized (MODIS default)
all radiance polarized like Rayleigh + Glint

option.name: rad_opt
option.description: radiation correction option (sensor-specific) 0: no correction 1: apply MERIS Smile correction

option.name: xcalfile
option.description: cross-calibration file

option.name: xcal_opt
option.description: cross-calibration option (sensor-specific) comma separated list of option values, 1 per band, with bands listed in xcal_wave. 3: apply cross-calibration corrections (polarization and rvs) 2: apply cross-calibration polarization corrections 1: apply cross-calibration rvs corrections 0: no correction

option.name: xcal_wave
option.description: wavelengths at which to apply cross-calibration. Comma separated list of sensor wavelength values associated with xcal_opt.

option.name: resolution
option.description: processing resolution (MODIS only) -1: standard ocean 1km processing 1000: 1km resolution including aggregated 250 and 500m land bands 500: 500m resolution including aggregated 250 land bands and replication for lower resolution bands 250: 250m resolution with replication for lower resolution bands

validValue.description: 1km resolution including aggregated 250 and 500m land bands
500m resolution including aggregated 250 land bands and
250m resolution with replication for lower resolution bands

option.name: giop_aph_opt
option.description: GIOP model aph function type 0: tabulated (supplied via giop_aph_file) 2: Bricaud et al. 1995 (chlorophyll supplied via default empirical algorithm) 3: Ciotti and Bricaud 2006 (size fraction supplied via giop_aph_s)

validValue.description: Bricaud et al. 1995 (chlorophyll supplied via default empirical algorithm)
Ciotti and Bricaud 2006 (size fraction supplied via giop_aph_s)

option.name: giop_aph_file
option.description: GIOP model, tabulated aph spectra

option.name: giop_aph_s
option.description: GIOP model, spectral parameter for aph

option.name: giop_adg_opt
option.description: GIOP model adg function type 0: tabulated (supplied via giop_adg_file) 1: exponential with exponent supplied via giop_adg_s) 2: exponential with exponent derived via Lee et al. (2002) 3: exponential with exponent derived via OBPG method

validValue.description: exponential with exponent supplied via giop_adg_s)
exponential with exponent derived via Lee et al. (2002)
exponential with exponent derived via OBPG method

option.name: giop_adg_file
option.description: GIOP model, tabulated adg spectra

option.name: giop_adg_s
option.description: GIOP model, spectral parameter for adg

option.name: giop_bbp_opt
option.description: GIOP model bbp function type 0: tabulated (supplied via giop_bbp_file) 1: power-law with exponent supplied via giop_bbp_s) 2: power-law with exponent derived via Hoge and Lyon (1996) 3: power-law with exponent derived via Lee et al. (2002) 5: power-law with exponent derived via Ciotti et al. (1999) 6: power-law with exponent derived via Morel and Maritorena (2001) 7: power-law with exponent derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000) 8: spectrally independent vector derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000) 9: fixed vector derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000) 10: fixed vector derived via lee et al. (2002)

validValue.description: power-law with exponent supplied via giop_bbp_s)
power-law with exponent derived via Hoge and Lyon (1996)
power-law with exponent derived via Lee et al. (2002)
power-law with exponent derived via Ciotti et al. (1999)
power-law with exponent derived via Morel and Maritorena (2001)
power-law with exponent derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000)
spectrally independent vector derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000)
fixed vector derived via Loisel and Stramski (2000)
fixed vector derived via lee et al. (2002)

option.name: giop_bbp_file
option.description: GIOP model, tabulated bbp spectra

option.name: giop_bbp_s
option.description: GIOP model, spectral parameter for bbp

option.name: giop_rrs_opt
option.description: GIOP model Rrs to bb/(a+bb) method 0: Gordon quadratic (specified with giop_grd) 1: Morel f/Q

option.name: giop_grd
option.description: GIOP model, Gordon Rrs to bb/(a+bb) quadratic coefficients

option.name: giop_wave
option.description: GIOP model list of sensor wavelengths for optimization comma-seperated list, defaults is all visible bands (400-700nm)

option.name: giop_rrs_unc
option.description: GIOP model list of sensor wavelengths for optimization comma-seperated list, defaults is all visible bands (400-700nm)

option.name: giop_maxiter
option.description: GIOP Model iteration limit

option.name: giop_fit_opt
option.description: GIOP model optimization method 0: Amoeba optimization 1: Levenberg-Marquardt optimization 3: SVD matrix inversion

option.name: giop_ts_opt
option.description: GIOP temperature and salinity dependence 0: none 1: apply to bbw

option.name: gsm_opt
option.description: GSM model options 0: default coefficients 1: Chesapeake regional coefficients

option.name: gsm_fit
option.description: SM fit algorithm 0: Amoeba 1: Levenberg-Marquardt

option.name: gsm_adg_s
option.description: GSM IOP model, spectral slope for adg

option.name: gsm_bbp_s
option.description: GSM IOP model, spectral slope for bbp

option.name: gsm_aphw
option.description: GSM IOP model, wavelengths of ap* table

option.name: gsm_aphs
option.description: GSM IOP model, coefficients of ap* table

option.name: qaa_adg_s
option.description: QAA IOP model, spectral slope for adg

option.name: qaa_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for QAA algorithm

option.name: chloc2_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for OC2 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chloc2_coef
option.description: coefficients for OC2 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chloc3_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for OC3 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chloc3_coef
option.description: coefficients for OC3 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chloc4_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for OC4 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chloc4_coef
option.description: coefficients for OC4 chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chlclark_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for Clark chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: chlclark_coef
option.description: coefficients for Clark chlorophyll algorithm

option.name: kd2_wave
option.description: sensor wavelengths for polynomial Kd(490) algorithm

option.name: kd2_coef
option.description: sensor wavelengths for polynomial Kd(490) algorithm

option.name: flh_offset
option.description: bias to subtract from retrieved fluorescence line height

option.name: btfile
option.description: IR brightness temperature file

option.name: sstcoeffile
option.description: IR sst algorithm coefficients file

option.name: sstssesfile
option.description: IR sst algorithm error statistics file

option.name: sstmirrfile
option.description: IR sst algorithm mirror-side corrections file

option.name: sst4coeffile
option.description: SWIR sst algorithm coefficients file

option.name: sst4ssesfile
option.description: SWIR sst algorithm error statistics file

option.name: sst4mirrfile
option.description: SWIR sst algorithm mirror-side corrections file

option.name: owtfile
option.description: optical water type file

option.name: owtchlerrfile
option.description: chl error file associate with optical water type

option.name: aermodels
option.description: aerosol models

option.name: met1
option.description: 1st meteorological ancillary data file

option.name: met2
option.description: 2nd meteorological ancillary data file

option.name: met3
option.description: 3rd meteorological ancillary data file

option.name: ozone1
option.description: 1st ozone ancillary data file

option.name: ozone2
option.description: 2nd ozone ancillary data file

option.name: ozone3
option.description: 3rd ozone ancillary data file

option.name: land
option.description: land mask file

option.name: water
option.description: shallow water mask file

option.name: demfile
option.description: digital elevation map file

option.name: icefile
option.description: sea ice file

option.name: ice_threshold
option.description: sea ice fraction above which will be flagged as sea ice

option.name: sstfile
option.description: input SST reference file

option.name: sssfile
option.description: input SSS reference file

option.name: no2file
option.description: no2 ancillary file

option.name: alphafile
option.description: alpha510 climatology file

option.name: tauafile
option.description: taua865 climatology file

option.name: cldfile
option.description: cloud mask file (MODIS only)

option.name: calfile
option.description: system calibration file

option.name: offset
option.description: calibration offset adjustment

option.name: gain
option.description: calibration gain multiplier

option.name: gain_unc
option.description: calibration gain uncertainty

option.name: flaguse
option.description: Flags to use

option.name: xcalbox
option.description: pixel size of the central box in the L1 scene (e.g. 5 pixels around MOBY) to be extracted into xcalfile for the cross-calibration, 0=whole L1

option.name: xcalboxcenter
option.description: Centeral [ipix, iscan] of the box in the L1 scene, [0,0] = center of the L1 scene

option.name: xcalpervalid
option.description: min percent of valid cross-calibration pixels within the box or the L1 scene, 0 = at least 1 pixel

option.name: xcalsubsmpl
option.description: Subsampling rate for the data to be used for the cross-calibration

option.name: vct_msk_water
option.description: use deep water mask to select data for target file: 0: no selection with mask 1: use deep water mask

option.name: vct_water
option.description: name of deep water mask to use

option.name: vct_min_nbin
option.description: minimum # of samples in a bin for acceptance

option.name: vct_fill_pct
option.description: minimum % of samples filled in target file to allow target file creation, if greater than 0, create target, aerosol files regardless

option.name: maxpointdist
option.description: max distance between L1 and L2 pixels in km -1.0: use mean res of L1 data 0.0: max{mean(L1 res),mean(L2 res)}

validValue.description: use mean res of L1 data

option.name: chlthreshold
option.description: threshold on L2 data chlorophyll (100.000000=CHL_MAX)

option.name: aotthreshold
option.description: threshold on L2 data AOTs (1.000000=AOT_MAX)

option.name: coccolith
option.description: coccolithophore algorithm coefs

option.name: cirrus_thresh
option.description: cirrus reflectance thresholds

option.name: taua
option.description: [taua_band1,...,taua_bandn] aerosol optical thickness of the calibration data point

option.name: cloud_thresh
option.description: cloud reflectance threshold

option.name: cloud_wave
option.description: wavelength of cloud reflectance test

option.name: cloud_eps
option.description: cloud reflectace ratio threshold (-1.0=disabled)

option.name: glint_thresh
option.description: high sun glint threshold

option.name: absaer
option.description: absorbing aerosol threshold on aerosol index

option.name: rhoamin
option.description: min NIR aerosol reflectance to attempt model lookup

option.name: sunzen
option.description: sun zenith angle threshold in deg.

option.name: satzen
option.description: satellite zenith angle threshold

option.name: epsmin
option.description: minimum epsilon to trigger atmospheric correction failure flag

option.name: epsmax
option.description: maximum epsilon to trigger atmospheric correction failure flag

option.name: tauamax
option.description: maximum 865 aerosol optical depth to trigger hitau flag

option.name: nLwmin
option.description: minimum nLw(555) to trigger low Lw flag

option.name: hipol
option.description: threshold on degree-of-polarization to set HIPOL flag

option.name: wsmax
option.description: windspeed limit on white-cap correction in m/s

option.name: windspeed
option.description: user over-ride of windspeed in m/s (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: windangle
option.description: user over-ride of wind angle in deg (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: pressure
option.description: user over-ride of atmospheric pressure in mb (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: ozone
option.description: user over-ride of ozone concentration in cm (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: relhumid
option.description: user over-ride of relative humidity in percent (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: watervapor
option.description: user over-ride of water vapor in g/cm^2 (-1000=use ancillary files)

option.name: maskland
option.description: land mask option

option.name: maskbath
option.description: shallow water mask option

option.name: maskcloud
option.description: cloud mask option

option.name: maskglint
option.description: glint mask option

option.name: masksunzen
option.description: large sun zenith angle mask option

option.name: masksatzen
option.description: large satellite zenith angle mask option

option.name: maskhilt
option.description: high Lt masking

option.name: maskstlight
option.description: stray light masking

option.name: sl_frac
option.description: SeaWiFS only, straylight fractional threshold on Ltypical

option.name: sl_pixl
option.description: SeaWiFS only, number of LAC pixels for straylight flagging

option.name: vcal_opt
option.description: Vicarious calibration option

option.name: vcal_chl
option.description: Vicarious calibration chl

option.name: vcal_solz
option.description: Vicarious calibration solz

option.name: vcal_nLw
option.description: Vicarious calibration normalized water leaving radiances

option.name: vcal_Lw
option.description: Vicarious calibration water leaving radiances

option.name: owmcfile
option.description: lut for OWMC classification

option.name: stype
option.description: scaling type 0: log 1: linear

option.name: rgb
option.description: bands to use for red, green and blue

option.name: north
option.description: north boundry

option.name: south
option.description: south boundry

option.name: east
option.description: east boundry

option.name: west
option.description: west boundry

option.name: xbox
option.description: number of pixels on either side of the SW point

option.name: ybox
option.description: number of scan lines on either side of the SW point

option.name: width
option.description: width of output image

option.name: threshold
option.description: threshold for the number of good pixels before an image is produced

option.name: datamin
option.description: minumum reflectance for scaling

option.name: datamax
option.description: maximum reflectance for scaling

option.name: subsamp
option.description: subsampling interval

option.name: outmode
option.description: defines output format 0: 8bit HDF 1: 24bit HDF 2: PPM 3: flat binary 4: PNG

option.name: prodxmlfile
option.description: output XML file describing all possible products
